channel.title: Range and mage attacking distance
channel.description:
Like the title says.. Whenever I cast a mage spell or attack with range I run towards the person and stand directly infront of them.. If you need more detail I can try and give it but I think that's to the point. I'm not asking to be spoon fed although it would be nice. But if not just give me a general spot to search for/look at and I can try and fix it.
So much appreciation - Thanks, Ethan

item.title: Range and mage attacking distance
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
